title: 1467Woke Portland Politician Who Demanded “Unhoused Neighbors” Be Given a Place to Sleep Has Home To
content:
1467 Woke Portland Politician Who Demanded “Unhoused Neighbors” Be Given a Place to Sleep Has Home Torched by Homeless Person (www.thegatewaypundit.com) posted 6 days ago by Trick 123 comments award share report block Woke Portland Politician Who Demanded "Unhoused Neighbors" Be Given a Place to Sleep Has Home Torched by Homeless Person | The G... A Portland Democrat who once called for homeless individuals to be given housing suffered an ironic and cruel twist of fate last week. www.thegatewaypundit.com
123 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Yawnz13 50 points 6 days ago Actual homeless, or "homeless"? permalink award report block reply lolpaladins 26 points 6 days ago he's been arrested 50 times, that means actual homeless. They only lock people up for a long time when they have something to lose. permalink parent award report block reply SicSemperTyrannis2 9 points 6 days ago Over 50x since 2006. The irony just keeps coming with this one: he says he tried to use an electrical outlet to get warm. When that didn't work he started a fire. When that got out of control he tried putting it out with his foot. When that didn't work he went to a nearby church. https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=0fodyfZi-No&pp=ygUUQW50aWZhIGZlZXQgb24gZmlyZSDSBwkJAwoBhyohjO8%3D My only complaint is this isn't an endless loop permalink parent award report block reply Yawnz13 7 points 6 days ago Depends on what he's been arrested for. permalink parent award report block reply Spartacus1188 4 points 5 days ago Euthanasia is the perfect solution for the homeless. permalink parent award report block reply TheMemesofProduction 21 points 6 days ago The perp’s name is literally Vashon Locust.
